name: Dust Mephit
movement: 30 ft. walking and flying at 30 ft.
description: A small, impish elemental creature made of swirling dust and sand, with a body that constantly shifts and ragged wings.
memorable: The Dust Mephit delights in causing confusion and blinding foes with clouds of dust.
goals: To create chaos and confusion in desolate areas while evading direct confrontation.
relations: Often found alongside other elemental creatures or in areas plagued by dust storms.
environment: Deserts and ruins, where it can hide in the swirling sands.
strengths: Can blind or incapacitate enemies with its special abilities and has decent agility.
weaknesses: Physically weak with low strength and constitution, vulnerable to fire damage.
attacks: Uses claws to deal slashing damage, and can exhale a cone of blinding dust.
most_powerful_ability: Blinding Breath, which creates a cloud of dust that blinds enemies.
senses: Has darkvision with a range of 60 feet and a passive perception of 12.
skills: Proficient in stealth and capable of surprising opponents effectively.
additional_information: Explodes in a cloud of dust upon death, blinding nearby creatures.
Can blend in with dirt while motionless, making it difficult to detect.
Immune to poison damage and does not require air, sustenance, or sleep.
Can cast the sleep spell once per day without components.
Uses sand irritation to deal additional damage over time.
spellcasting: Can cast the sleep spell once per day using Wisdom as its spellcasting ability.

mischievous elemental that hides in dirt
impish creature that creates dust storms
small flying creature with abilities to confuse
elemental that explodes into dust upon death
